snippet: It is tempting to say that the Josh Hamilt0n deal swings the balance of power in the American League West to the Angels, but we learned last winter that it really doesn’t work that way.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column says it is tempting say that by signing outfielder Josh Hamilton the balance of power in the American League West swings to the Los Angeles Angels, but previous lessons show it does not work that way.
lead_paragraph: It is tempting to say that the Josh Hamilt0n deal swings the balance of power in the American League West to the Angels, but we learned last winter that it really doesn’t work that way.

headline.seo: Hamilton Joins Pujols With the Angels
headline.main: Angels Hoping Hamilton Builds on His Legacy
headline.print_headline: Angels Hoping Hamilton Builds on His Legacy
